title: Kanye sparks bizarre Dancing With The Stars feud with new album Jesus Is King
text:
Kanye West sparked a Dancing With The Stars feud in Jesus Is King (Picture: GC Images)

Kanye West blessed us all with new album Jesus Is King yesterday, after months of waiting.

But, while we were all thrilled to finally have new Yeezy music in our lives, the 42-year-old has accidentally sparked a bizarre feud with track Oh God.

In the song, the dad-of-four can be heard rapping: ‘That’s why I charge the prices that I charge, I can’t be out here Dancing With the Stars.

‘No, I cannot let my family starve.’

A little awkward considering wife Kim Kardashian actually took part on Dancing With The Stars way back in 2008.

Side note: She didn’t actually go that far, and was eliminated in week three.

And DTWS professional dancer Val Chmerkovskiy wasn’t too impressed with all the shade being thrown the show’s way.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Taking to his Instagram, he shared a video of himself listening to the song, seemingly taken aback by the lyrics.

The clip then showed a string of photos of Kimmy taking part on the show, alongside a sipping tea gif.

‘Yo Kanye, keep talking that smack about Dancing With the Stars man, you’re going to catch this diss track…

‘With some rhinestones on it.’

Kim Kardashian competed in Dancing With The Stars in 2008 (Picture: Rex)

Alongside the video, Val told his 1million followers: ‘That new Ye album got me in my feelings #shotsfired.’

Shots fired indeed.

Kanye sent fans into total meltdown when he finally dropped new album Jesus Is King – after pushing the release back for months.

And, despite spending what felt like an age waiting for new Yeezy goodness, it turns out we won’t have to bide our time for his next tour.

In fact, the Gold Digger rapper is heading out on the road as soon as possible – in between his bid for Presidency, that is.

When asked if he would be touring the album, he told TMZ: ‘Right away.’

Count. Us. In.

description: Kanye sparks bizarre Dancing With The Stars feud with new album Jesus Is King after making dig at dancing show
